name: Blank (Fluffy_The_Cat)
description:
A little 2D platformer where every sprite is 8x8.  Every sprite is made by me and sound. 

 There is 6 levels in the game and its pretty short.

Made with the Godot game engene 3.1 and made during the Wowie 2.0 GameJam. (First gamejam)

The part when your jump changes, was actually a bug i encountered while making gravety. So i turned it in to feature..

Controls:

A = Left      

D = Right     

W or space = Jump
